snippet: Syria declared Jordan's charge d'affaires in Damascus persona non grata in response to what it said was an unjustified decision by the kingdom to expel its ambassador, Syrian state television said on Monday....

headline.print_headline: Syria Says Jordan's Top Diplomat Persona Non Grata in Tit-For-Tat Move
headline.main: Syria Says Jordan's Top Diplomat Persona Non Grata in Tit-For-Tat Move

lead_paragraph: Syria declared Jordan's charge d'affaires in Damascus persona non grata in response to what it said was an unjustified decision by the kingdom to expel its ambassador, Syrian state television said on Monday.
